content: this legal text summarizes a case involving two parties la and mg regarding the ownership of a building in municipality castelfidardo the parties have agreed to end their joint ownership and divide the building into two separate shares mr mg is assigned one share while mrs la is assigned the other share the values of the shares are specified with mrs la receiving a balance of €800000 from mr gm additionally an easement is established and valued at €800000 the document is signed by a notary and the parties involved
